notes: YEK pipeline record — covers only manuscripts found via YEK portal (Sessions 1–4, 2026-02-25/26). For the full global corpus including auction lots, museum records, and bibliographic references, see catalog/world_corpus.json (48 entries). YEK portal exhaustively searched across 4 sessions, all 5 term tiers × all relevant fields. No further genuine attributions found in YEK beyond these 2 records.

manuscripts.title: Dîvân-ı Sultân Hüseyin Baykara
manuscripts.notes: Attribution rests on YEK cataloguer entry in Nüshayla ilgili kişiler only. No scribal colophon found in digitized copy (64 pages examined). No ManuscriptRecord created pending further evidence.

manuscripts.title: Bustān (Saʿdī)
manuscripts.notes: Three colophon-verifier passes (2026-02-26). IIIF ID confirmed: 0000000664425. True total: 152 pages. Colophon on IIIF p147 left (folio 144v). Formula 'أضعف عبادالله' legible. Scribe name portion physically lost to folio damage at right margin. No further digital resolution possible. Direct contact with Istanbul Arkeoloji Muzesi recommended.
